meanings.definition: A synthetic antibacterial agent used to treat various bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed a fluoroquinolone to treat the infection.
meanings.sent2: She took a fluoroquinolone to help fight off the bacteria.
meanings.sent3: The fluoroquinolone went to battle against the pesky bacteria invaders.
meanings.sent4: Like a warrior, the fluoroquinolone fought bravely against the bacterial foes.
meanings.sent5: The fluoroquinolone acted like a shield, protecting the body from harmful bacteria.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of synthetic broad-spectrum antibiotics.
meanings.sent1: The hospital stocked various fluoroquinolones to combat infections.
meanings.sent2: Fluoroquinolones are effective against a wide range of bacteria.
meanings.sent3: The fluoroquinolone squad assembled to take down the bacterial army.
meanings.sent4: In the world of antibiotics, fluoroquinolones are like versatile tools.
meanings.sent5: The fluoroquinolone army marched through the body, targeting harmful bacteria.
